Cirothe12: No idea what version of Forge you tried, but "minecraftforge-universal-1.4.5-6.4.0.396" works without problems for me. Both with clean JAR and with Optifine.

LeoCYH: There is nothing like cracked server. It's just offline mode server. Means that server isn't doing user verification through minecraft dot net, instead those servers rely on their own user verification systems (plugins). And it's just matter of setting online-mode to false in the server.properties file.

piperxo: Install latest drivers for your video card. If it doesn't help, also download and install latest LWJGL (see minecraftwiki for tutorials).

piperxo: Also, I assume you are using laptop or desktop with integrated graphics? Or just very old graphic card? If so, also you can try lowering od disabling graphic hardware acceleration. That did the trick for me on the old office laptop.
I figured it out after I had posted that. I had to reinstall my nvidia after i upgraded to 7 and it loads up just fine. now to deal with crappy frame rates haha.
